body.name: 基于二分Kmeans的层次聚类
body.description: 输入数据的格式为TXT格式，输入文件根目录为点数据根目录，基于二分Kmeans算法计算各点数据属于的类别
body.algo: 二分Kmeans算法属于自顶而下的层次聚类方法,
body.input: [{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]},{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]}]
body.out: [{"path":"file","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"String","name":"ClusterID","description":"点所属类别","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Double]","name":"CenterX","description":"聚类中心","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Double]","name":"Point","description":"点对象值","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"nnDist","description":"点到聚类中心的距离","required":"true"}]}]
body.parameters: [{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"任务名称","description":"一个SPARK任务的名称"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输入点数据","description":"详见input描述"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输出聚类中心文件","description":"详见output描述"},{"default":"3","datatype":"Integer","name":"聚类类别个数","description":"结果中聚类类别的个数"},{"default":"20","datatype":"Integer","name":"最大迭代次数","description":"计算聚类中心时迭代次数的最大值"},{"default":"0.5","datatype":"Integer","name":"每个类中的最小个数","description":"最终聚类结果中各个类中点的最小个数"}]
body.test:
{"outDesc":"准确率99%;3 min","cmdline":"
		./bin/spark-submit 
		--master yarn-cluster 
		--num-executors 4 
		--executor-memory 2G 
		--executor-cores 4 
		--conf spark.default.parallelism=32 
		--class com.igsnrr.toolbox.spatialclustering.bitsectingkmeans.BKmeans 
		toolbox-0.0.1.jar /test/data/data_3d /test/data/data_3d_bkmeans_res 
		","in":"/test/data/data_3d","inDesc":"三维点数据;1000000","out":"/test/res/data_3d_res"}
